author: Dwayne Johnson
quote: Success isn't always about ‘Greatness’, it’s about consistency. Consistent, hard work gains success. Greatness will come.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: The worst thing I can be is the same as everybody else. I hate that.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.

author: Mario Andretti
quote: If you have everything under control, you’re not moving fast enough.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.

author: Ronnie Coleman
quote: Everybody wants to be a bodybuilder, but don’t nobody wanna lift no heavy ass weight.
If the bar ain't bendin', then you're just pretendin'.

author: Anderson Silva
quote: I'm not the best. I just believe I can do things other people think are impossible.

author: Rashad Evans
quote: We are all fighters. Every single person who walks this earth is a fighter. Everything that lives. To live is to fight. And we just fight in different arenas.

author: Diego Sanchez
quote: The mind and the body can do anything and there are no limits. The only limits we have are the limits we give ourselves.

author: Miesha Tate
quote: Whether I come up short or win, I want to walk away knowing I gave my all.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.

author: Mark Rippetoe
quote: Poor form in the gym is caused by insufficient yelling.

author: Mark Rippetoe
quote: Strong people are harder to kill than weak people and more useful in general.

author: Steve Shaw
quote: On the Internet, everyone squats. In real life, the squat rack is always empty. You figure out what this means.
